page.title: 05Clubs in Alburgh
page.content: Clubs in Alburgh For some activities clubs have been formed. The Womens Institute, a country wide organistion thrives in Albrough with a membership of 35 meeting to stimulate women of the area by outside speakers, visits and meetings with other insitutes in the area.Alburgh village hall is often the host for an area meeting. The Tuesday Club - a group of ladies wishing to go on visits, listen to speakers and partake in activities such as cycling together, meets in members homes monthly. The over 60s meet in the village hall. Agroup of retired residents join to chat, drink tea and play games. The playgroup is run with the help of mothers for children aged between 2\ and five years.
